scripts.build:i18n: for file in `find . -name "*.po"` ; do msgfmt -o ${file/.po/.mo} $file ; done
scripts.build:archive: rm ./theme.zip; zip -r9 ./theme.zip *.php assets/images/* languages/*.mo template-parts/* inc/* vendor/* style.css screenshot.png
scripts.build: npm run build:css &&  npm run build:archive
